file.title: Flat style

p.text: Sets the shape of the object (flat, three-dimensional).

p.textAll: All available button styles are described in Quick fill words -> Flat style.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how the button style can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Flat style = "Default" Window1.Button1.Flat style = Popup Window1.Button1.Flat style = Window1.Button2.Flat style Window1.Button1.Flat style = Window1.Text1.Text

file.seealso:
